snippet.title: Powerplay RTS | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Powerplay – an RTS where industry, resource management, and military strategy converge.

👉 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010280/Powerplay/

If you like Factorio and C&C, you'll love this one! 
In Powerplay, you lead an industrial nation on the path to prosperity. 
But beware, resources are finite, and "the others" are always lurking to reclaim what is theirs. 
Will you build a thriving nation, or will your ambitions spread you too thin?

Key Features:

Build and manage complex supply chains.
Explore and expand your territory.
Face off against "the others" who seek to reclaim their land.
Lead your nation to prosperity while balancing finite resources.

🔔 Subscribe now to be the first to see our next trailer and gameplay reveal!

👉 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010280/Powerplay/

#PowerplayGame #RTS #announcement #gaming  #BaseBuilding #StrategyGame
